eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following areas: Jefferson Davis, LA; at 01:14 PM ON DEC 12, 2025 Effective until 03:14 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
The city of Jennings is currently experiencing a water outage.  The water line has been repaired. City officials advise the water should be back on line within the next hour or two. Monitor news outlets for  more information  

Thank you for your patience in this matter. 

Jefferson Davis Parish Office of Emergency Preparedness
